verses.text: Ye shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* you no \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* nor graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, neither rear you \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a standing \w image|strong="H4676"\w*, neither shall ye set \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \add any\add* \w image|strong="H4906"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, to bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* unto it: for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 26.1 \ft standing…: or, pillar\f*\f + \fr 26.1 \ft image of…: or, figured stone: Heb. a stone of picture\f*
¶ Ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and \w reverence|strong="H3372"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ If ye \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them;

Then I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* in due \w season|strong="H6256"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*, and the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* their \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*.

And your \w threshing|strong="H1786"\w* shall \w reach|strong="H5381"\w* unto the \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w*, and the \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w* shall \w reach|strong="H5381"\w* unto the sowing \w time|strong="H2233"\w*: and ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* your \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w full|strong="H7648"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*.

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and ye shall lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, and none shall make \add you\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*: and I will \w rid|strong="H7673"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, neither shall the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* through your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 26.6 \ft rid: Heb. cause to cease\f*
And ye shall \w chase|strong="H7291"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And \w five|strong="H2568"\w* of you shall \w chase|strong="H7291"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* of you shall put ten \w thousand|strong="H7233"\w* to \w flight|strong="H7291"\w*: and your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

For I will have \w respect|strong="H6437"\w* unto you, and make you \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w*, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* you, and \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with you.
And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* old \w store|strong="H3462"\w*, and bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w old|strong="H3465"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w new|strong="H2319"\w*.
And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you: and my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall not \w abhor|strong="H1602"\w* you.

And I will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you, and will \w be|strong="H1961"\w* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and ye shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, that ye should not be their \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*; and I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bands|strong="H4133"\w* of your \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, and made you \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w upright|strong="H6968"\w*.
¶ But if ye will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, and will not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*;

And if ye shall \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, or if your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w abhor|strong="H1602"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, so that ye will not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \add but\add* that ye \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:

I also will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this unto you; I will even \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* over you \w terror|strong="H0928"\w*, \w consumption|strong="H7829"\w*, and the burning \w ague|strong="H6920"\w*, that shall \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and cause \w sorrow|strong="H1727"\w* of \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*: and ye shall \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* your \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7385"\w*, for your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.\f + \fr 26.16 \ft over: Heb. upon\f*

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against you, and ye shall be \w slain|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: they that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* you shall \w reign|strong="H7287"\w* over you; and ye shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* when none \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w* you.

And if ye will not \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* for all this \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, then I will \w punish|strong="H3256"\w* you seven \w times|strong="H7651"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* for your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

And I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of your \w power|strong="H5797"\w*; and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* your \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* as \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and your \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* as \w brass|strong="H5154"\w*:

And your \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* shall be \w spent|strong="H8552"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7385"\w*: for your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall not \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*, neither shall the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* their \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w*.

¶ And if ye \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto me, and \w will|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me; I will \w bring|strong="H3254"\w* seven \w times|strong="H7651"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* upon you according to your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 26.21 \ft contrary…: or, at all adventures with me\f*

I will also \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* among you, which shall rob you of your \w children|strong="H7921"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* your \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and make you few in \w number|strong="H4591"\w*; and your \add high\add* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*.
And if ye will not be \w reformed|strong="H3256"\w* by me by these things, but will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto me;

Then will I also \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto you, and will \w punish|strong="H5221"\w* you \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* seven \w times|strong="H7651"\w* for your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

And I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon you, that shall \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* the \w quarrel|strong="H5359"\w* of \add my\add* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: and when ye are gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w within|strong="H0413"\w* your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you; and ye shall be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

\add And\add* when I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* of your \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* your \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, and they shall \w deliver|strong="H7725"\w* \add you\add* your \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* by \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*: and ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and not be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*.
And if ye will not for all \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, but \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto me;

Then I will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto you also in \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; and I, \w even|strong="H0637"\w* I, will \w chastise|strong="H3256"\w* you seven \w times|strong="H7651"\w* for your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

And I will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* your high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* your \w images|strong="H2553"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* your \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* upon the \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* of your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, and my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w abhor|strong="H1602"\w* you.

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H8074"\w* your \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* unto \w desolation|strong="H8074"\w*, and I will not \w smell|strong="H7306"\w* the \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* of your sweet \w odours|strong="H5207"\w*.

And I will \w bring|strong="H8074"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into \w desolation|strong="H8074"\w*: and your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* at it.

And I will \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* you among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and will draw \w out|strong="H7324"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you: and your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, and your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*.

Then shall the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w enjoy|strong="H7521"\w* her \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, as \w long|strong="H3117"\w* as it lieth \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and ye \add be\add* in your \w enemies’|strong="H0341"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; \add even\add* then shall the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*, and \w enjoy|strong="H7521"\w* her \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*.

As long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* it lieth \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* it shall \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*; because it did not \w rest|strong="H7673"\w* in your \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, when ye \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* upon it.

And upon them that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \add alive\add* of you I will \w send|strong="H0935"\w* a \w faintness|strong="H4816"\w* into their \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* in the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; and the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w shaken|strong="H5086"\w* \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* shall \w chase|strong="H7291"\w* them; and they shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, as \w fleeing|strong="H4499"\w* from a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* when none \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w*.\f + \fr 26.36 \ft shaken: Heb. driven\f*

And they shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* upon \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, as it were \w before|strong="H6440"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, when none \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w*: and ye shall have no power to \w stand|strong="H8617"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.
And ye shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* shall eat you \w up|strong="H0398"\w*.

And they that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* of you shall pine \w away|strong="H4743"\w* in their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* in your \w enemies’|strong="H0341"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*; and also in the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall they pine \w away|strong="H4743"\w* with them.

If they shall \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, with their \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* which they \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against me, and that also they have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto me;

And \add that\add* I also have \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w contrary|strong="H7147"\w* unto them, and have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; if \w then|strong="H0176"\w* their \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* be \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w*, and they then \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* of the punishment of their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*:

Then will I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and also my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and also my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* will I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w*; and I will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \w land|strong="H0776"\w* also shall be \w left|strong="H5800"\w* of them, and shall \w enjoy|strong="H7521"\w* her \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, while she lieth \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* without them: and they shall \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* of the punishment of their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: \w because|strong="H3282"\w*, even \w because|strong="H3282"\w* they \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and because their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w abhorred|strong="H1602"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*.

And \w yet|strong="H0637"\w* for all \w that|strong="H2063"\w*, when they \w be|strong="H1571"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, I will not cast them \w away|strong="H3988"\w*, neither will I \w abhor|strong="H1602"\w* them, to destroy them \w utterly|strong="H3615"\w*, and to \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them: for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But I will for their sakes \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of their \w ancestors|strong="H7223"\w*, whom I brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, that I might be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

These \add are\add* the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* and \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* between him and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
